item.title: Create a Hugo Blog and connect it with Google Analytics
item.description: Creating a blog with Hugo and hosting it in GitHub Pages is easy. I am not going to explain it because you have this wonderful post by @panicoenlabox , who explains it perfectly and it is the one that I followed.

item.title: JoinCsv
item.description: This was my first utility written in Python, when I was learning the basics before going deep into the Databricks world.
